County News







Stay up to date with the latest updates
 






  
 
 















Planning an Outdoor Festival? Do you need an Outdoor Festival License? 



Butte County Development Services Reminds Residents, Organizations, and Businesses that some Outdoor Festivals require an Outdoor Festival License.						Read on...







Butte County Library Announces Sure Start for Early Years Library Playtime 



Sure Start for Early Years Library Playtime! Every Wednesday from 8:30-11:30am at Oroville Branch Library located at 1820 Mitchell Ave, and every Thursday from 8:30-11:30am at the Chico Branch Library located at 1108 Sherman Ave.						Read on...

Butte County Announces Teen Scholarship Opportunity						Read on...







Butte County Library Announces Access To Technology Program 



The Access To Technology Program is geared towards Seniors and Persons with Disabilities						Read on...
